subject: Firmware
description_text:
I have a set of pedals that tried doing a firmware update but the percentage stays at 0% but says upgrade complete but then back on device screen it say SIMSONN Flasher!..
Please help as now i can't drive at all.
Kind Regards
Tony Wolski

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Tony Wolski,    Please provide your order number and we shall assist you in resolving the matter. Do not worry.
